attributes.action: Hold a general election on the 15 October 2019 let the people decide.
attributes.additional_details:
2016 - We voted to leave.
MP's had various votes and did not rule out no deal brexit.
2019 - Theresa May came back with a deal which the House rejected.
2019 - Boris Johnson attempts to uphold referendum result and House demands.
2019 - Remain parties attempt to block referendum result.
2019 - Remain parties refuse to allow an Election for the people to decide which option they prefer.
attributes.background:
Whether you are leave or remain. Whatever your political persuasion. We are their bosses and democracy has to be allowed. 
Vote Conservative for Brexit as per the Referendum result.
Vote Lib Dem or Labour for Remain.
This really isn't rocket science.
